DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the sensitivity of a new oxygen enhanced magnetic resonance imaging (OE-MRI) method in detecting changes in the lungs of patients with moderate to severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) following treatment with either Oxis Turbuhaler or Symbicort Turbuhaler.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of an Oxygen Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging Method on Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease During 8 Weeks Treatment With Either Symbicort Turbuhaler or Oxis Turbuhaler
